name: delay_5002_small
condition: request.method == "POST" and re.match(".+/broadcast", url) is not None  and request.get_json()["origin"] == "http://127.0.0.1:5002/"

name: delay_5003_small
condition: request.method == "POST" and re.match(".+/broadcast", url) is not None  and request.get_json()["origin"] == "http://127.0.0.1:5002/"

name: delay_5002_no_reg
condition: request.method == "PUT" and re.match(".+/lock", url) is not None  and request.get_json()["origin"] == "http://127.0.0.1:5002/"

name: delay_5003_no_reg
condition: request.method == "PUT" and re.match(".+/lock", url) is not None  and request.get_json()["origin"] == "http://127.0.0.1:5003/"
